title: How I Salvaged Old Farm Gates For A New Animal Shelter

tasks.task: Replace or repair a farm gate
subtasks: Assess the available materials for the gate
Determine the desired size of the gates (e.g., 45 inches overall dimension)
Evaluate the condition of the existing gate material (split into four pieces)
Confirm sufficient material for two small gates
Consider repurposing leftover material for future projects
Plan the construction approach for the two gates
Perform welding for the gate structure (using a rented $100 welder)
Learn welding techniques through online resources (YouTube videos)
Complete the second gate after finishing one

tasks.task: Wear appropriate safety gear while working (earplugs, protective clothing)
subtasks: Retrieve earplugs before starting the job
